page.title: 19Games In Thorpe Hesley
page.content: In the playground my favourite game is Tiggy Scarecrow.You play Tiggy Scarecrow like this, you get your friends and one has to be on.The one that is on has to catch you and if she does you have stand like a scarecrow and when one of your friends goes under your legs you are free and you run until you get caught again.My favourite game in school is Shipwreck.You play it by swimming in the sea and when someone shouts Shipwreck you have to jump on to a mat.The last one in the sea is out.Another game is kissing catch.You catch girls then you kiss them.My favourite game at home is football.You have a football and some nets and you get the football in the nets by kicking it.The side that scores the most goals wins.
